title: I’m Still Waiting
lyrics:
Oh, oh, oh, oh yeah

It's been so long
Since I touched a lady
And I'm still waiting
For you to come back to me, baby
Now will you forgive me
For the wrong I've done?
And let's try again
To make it last so long

I'm still waiting
For you to come back to love
To fulfill this life we're dreaming of
(So don't wait)
Another day might be too long
(Don`t rush)
Go slow so nothing goes wrong

Listen, baby
Whoa, oh oh, oh oh

I can't wait to feel your love again
'Cause you can stop this pain
That I've been feeling, baby (Ooh yeah)
So let's start all over
And put the past behind
And make a love to stand
To the test of time

I'm still waiting
(I'm still waiting, baby)
For you to come back to love
(You know it's been so long)
To fulfill this life, yeah
We`re dreaming of
(And these feelings are so very strong)
Another day might be too long
(Yeah, yeah, yeah)
Go slow so nothing goes wrong

I just can't take it no more, baby
No, baby
The feel of your warm embrace, baby
Ooh yeah, I'm still waiting on you, yeah

I`m still waiting
(I'm still waiting, baby)
For you to come back to love
(Oh, yes, I am)
To fulfill this life
(That we'll be dreaming of)
We`re dreaming of
(So baby, please, don't wanna wait, baby, baby)
Another day might be too long
(My arms are open wide)
Go slow so nothing goes wrong
(And I don't have to cry no more because)

Sometimes I get so lonely
Wanna call you, baby
Just a little love is all I need
(I call you, baby, when I'm lonely)
Just a little love is all I need
(Yeah, yeah, yeah)
Another day might be too long
(Another day might be too long)
Go slow so nothing goes wrong
(Yeah, oh, yeah)
Just a little love is all I need
(My arms are open wide)
Just a little love is all I need
(Yeah)
(Whoa, oh, oh, oh)
The feel of your warm embrace, baby
(Your lovely, warm embrace, to feel your loving face)
(And I need you, oh)

I'm still waiting
(I'm still waiting, baby)
For you to come back to love
(Come on back to love, baby)
To fulfill this life
(Come on back, come on back, baby)
We're dreaming of
(I want my, I want my baby, baby, baby)
Another day might be too long
